alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Logan County; Morgan County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 22 at 10:46AM MST until February 23 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills ongoing. Wind chills around 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central, north central, and northeast Colorado. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in 30 minutes or less.
info.instruction: The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. Keep pets indoors as much as possible.
